The Coinpayu is offering watching ads in exchange for satoshi reward. They provide enough ads to earn about 100-400 satoshi per day (about 30 minutes watching). They are also featuring referral program including referral market. Furthermore, they arrange various offers from the other providers (paid surveys etc.).

3. Faucet Crypto

The Faucet Crypto is a free bitcoin site similar to Coinpayu. It also offers: offerwall, watching ads and referral program. Furthermore, this site features a level system. You can gain user levels according to you activity on the site. Higher levels bring bonuses to you. On the other hand, this site is invasive with its ads and the time counters works only if the browser tab has a full focus. That is quite annoying.

4. FaucetPay

The FaucetPay is primarily a micropayment wallet and earning platform. In other words they help you to collect small amount of crypto from other sites without high transaction fee. They also feature: daily free faucet, multiply btc gambling games, referral program and exchange.

5. Cointiply

The Cointiply is yet another site offering free faucet, referral program and offerwall. They are pretty much similar to the Faucet Crypto.

6. BTCspinner

The BTCspinner is featuring a game (browser fidged spinner), free faucet (every 30 minutes) and referral program. The spinner can be fun for a while, but it is not paying much. Adblock is allowed on this site.

entry.title: A great review of freebitco.in
entry.content:
I have tested this faucet site for a few months. I analyzed all of their features. I have to conclude that I would recommend this site. Keep in mind, this post can be updated in future.

Is the site legit?

According to my tests (deposit/withdraw), the freebitco.in is legit. The freebitco.in is on the market for many years. During all my tests and experiments, I have not noticed anything suspicious. All of their features has reasonable parameters - they are not promising miracles. Also they are very transparent and their games can be classified as a provably fair. I also wrote Python script to replicate the random number generation process from server and user hash and I have to admit it is fair. They responded to my emails promptly.

Free faucet

The amount of BTC you can get from their faucet is derived from the value of USD. The biggest price you can get is BTC equivalent of $200. Every time you roll the faucet you have a chance 1:10000 to get the maximal price. There are also other bigger prices with various chances to success. The lowest price is approximately 0.002 USD. You can roll the faucet every 60 minutes.

How much can you get? In case you roll 10k times with an average luck (your rolls contain every possible number 1-1000 exactly once), then you win $270 worth in BTC. So in case you roll ten times per day, you get $270 in about 1k days (less than 3 years), or in other words $0.27 per day. Keep in mind that these numbers are average estimate for person with average luck in a long run.

Multiply BTC - HI-LO game

Their multiply BTC feature is traditional HI-LO game with quite a sophisticated interface. The rolls are fair. You can validate each roll according to the server hash. However, no matter what settings you use, the game is set to return back to the users only only fraction of the bets. If you set the game to coin flip mode, you will get only 47.5% winning chance. You would need 50% to stay even. So there is no chance to win in a long run with an average luck.

Earn - interest savings

Every balance higher than 30k satoshi is automatically increased daily. Currently the earning rate is set to 4.08% yearly, so it is roughly 1 satoshi per day for every 10k satoshi you have. The interest rate is similar to other legit services, so I would trust it is not a scam trick.

Lottery

There are actually two lotteries. You can buy or obtain tickets as reward for using their features. However the lotteries are not worthy in a long run. The prize of ticket is higher than an expected value. In other words, you pay more than you can actually win. The lottery is good only for fun.

Betting

The freebitco.in features quite an unique perimutuel betting option. The odds are set according to the pool size of the bet options. Example: if the most users bet on team A, you can get a much better odd on the team B. In common betting office you get odds according to an extremely precise prediction model, so you have a very little chance to win something in a long run. However, with the perimutuel betting the odds are given by actual bettors. Thus if you understand any topic - sport, politics etc. better than other people do, you should definitely try betting via freebitco.in.

I randomly bet on random topics for more than 150+ times on freebitco.in with outcome close to 0. Thus I assume that their fee is low and the winners are payed fairly.

Referral program

The freebitco.in has probably the best referral program I have ever seen:

  • 50% of your referral free rolls
  • reward points for referral bets, hi-lo rolls
  • 25% commissions on any interest earned by your referrals
Furthermore, you can reward your referrals with share from your profits.

Reward program

The freebitco.in also features interesting reward program. They pay you with reward points almost for every action you do (or your referrals do). You exchange the reward points for various prizes, or you can change them for BTC - one reward points is equal to one satoshi. Keep in mind that the exchange for BTC is possible only if you collect at least 100k of reward points. Also if you play free faucet more than 12 times per day, it is worthy to buy the reward point booster. You can buy this booster for 1200 reward points, and it grants you 100 extra points for every free roll.

Recommended strategy

To gain as much as possible via freebitco.in I would recommend:

  • roll faucet as often as possible
  • bet on events if you have the skill and knowledge to beat other players
  • choose to get reward points instead of lottery tickets in your profile settings (go to PROFILE/DISABLE LOTTERY & INTEREST/check DISABLE LOTTERY)
  • collect reward points and exchange them for BTC
  • strictly avoid the lottery and hi-lo game
  • get some active referrals

Summary

Pros:

  • They have a decent faucet that pays, if you are consistent and diligent.
  • They feature unique betting system than can be highly productive - depends on your skill.
  • Their referral program is just awesome.
  • They automatically give you interest if you have more than 30k satoshi
  • They are not living from ads, so they do not force you to observe junk ads.

Cons:

  • HI-LO game - this game is good for fun, but you cannot actually win in a long run.
  • Lottery - the tickets are not worthy in the long run (like with every lottery.

Conclusion

I would strongly recommend to use freebitco.in as a viable option in your free BTC site portfolio.
